publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4890 Kenneth Gibson: Gathering Dust?—That the Parliament notes the report of the Calman Commission on Scottish Devolution and wonders whether the UK Government intends to implement any of the recommendations and, if so, when. Supported by: Bob Doris*, Ian McKee*, Sandra White*, Rob Gibson*, Maureen Watt*
S3M-4890 Gathering Dust? (lodged on 21 September 2009) Brian Adam*
S3M-4890 Gathering Dust? (lodged on 21 September 2009) Gil Paterson*

S3M-4890 Kenneth Gibson: Gathering Dust?—That the Parliament notes the report of the Calman Commission on Scottish Devolution and wonders whether the UK Government intends to implement any of the recommendations and, if so, when. Supported by: Bob Doris, Ian McKee, Sandra White, Rob Gibson, Maureen Watt, Brian Adam, Gil Paterson, Michael Matheson*
S3M-4890 Gathering Dust? (lodged on 21 September 2009) Bill Kidd*
